newsitem.title: UK: Soros 75 percent sure EMU will happen on time.
newsitem.headline: Soros 75 percent sure EMU will happen on time.

text.p: International fund manager and philanthropist George Soros said he was 75 percent sure European economic and monetary union (EMU) would start as planned on January 1, 1999.
"EMU is going to happen, basically. The train has left the station and unless it's derailed I'm 75 percent sure it will get there," Soros said in a London lecture on building a democratic Europe.

Soros also said the upcoming French election posed a certain risk to EMU. Depending on how the poll went it could either increase the chances of EMU starting on time to 80 percent or cut them to 50 percent, he said.
